Key Match Events: Poland won the penalty shootout 5-4 after extra time.
Daniel James missed a crucial penalty which led to Poland's victory.
Wales' Euro 2024 qualification hopes ended in a dramatic penalty shootout loss.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was a Euro 2024 playoff between Wales and Poland.
Wales and Poland had a history of close encounters in previous tournaments.
The game was high-stakes for both teams aiming to qualify for Euro 2024.
Post-Match Reflections: Rob Page expressed his disappointment with the result.
Poland's manager Michal Probierz praised his team's resilience and penalty-taking skills.
Wales fans and players were left heartbroken after the last-minute defeat.
